long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blumgi Slime - An adorable jumping slime platformer game that brings ultimate relaxation!

Welcome to Blumgi Slime! This is an adorable slime platformer game where players control a soft and squishy slime to overcome various jumping challenges.

Key Features:

Adorable Character Design: The main character of the game is a soft and squishy slime, with a cute appearance and cartoon-like animations. It happily jumps and bounces, bringing endless joy and relaxation.

Simple and Challenging Levels: The game features multiple levels for you to explore. Each level is designed with various jumping obstacles and puzzles, requiring you to control the slime's jumping strength and direction to successfully navigate through. Challenge the levels, solve puzzles, and demonstrate your jumping skills and intelligence.

Relaxing Music and Visuals: The game is accompanied by cheerful and soothing background music, along with cute visual styles, creating a serene and delightful atmosphere. Whether you are jumping or solving puzzles, you will be immersed in a warm and joyful world.

Relaxing Gameplay Experience: Blumgi Slime offers a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience. Whether you want to unwind after a busy day or simply want to relax, this game provides a soothing and delightful gameplay time.
